original: intros m z s H. unfold Iter_rem_aux; rewrite Iter_rem_aux_equation. destruct H as [z_eq | H]. - rewrite z_eq. simpl. apply Nat.lt_sub_lt_add_r. apply lt_O_minus_lt. apply exds_card_pos in z_eq; auto. - simpl. destruct (exds_dec s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)). + apply Nat.lt_sub_lt_add_r. apply Nat.lt_sub_lt_add_l. apply card_rem_aux. apply Nat.lt_sub_lt_add_l in H; auto. + apply H.
